value.name: Kansas City detective pleads not guilty in deadly shooting of Cameron Lamb
value.description: A suspended Kansas City police detective pleaded not guilty in the fatal shooting of 26-year-old Cameron Lamb in 2019, who was killed while sitting in his truck in his garage.

value.description: A judge has denied a motion to dismiss the charges against a Kansas City police officer filed in a deadly shooting. Last year, Eric Devalkenaere was charged in the death of Cameron Lamb.
